text: CrespignanoStatuto comunale di Calci, Art. 4. is a village in Tuscany, central Italy, administratively a frazione of the comune of Calci, province of Pisa. It is about 12 km from Pisa and 3 km from the municipal seat of La Pieve. == References == == Bibliography == * Category:Frazioni of the Province of Pisa
title: Crespignano
